cds::queue::LMSQueue< gc::ptb_gc, T, TRAITS, ALLOCATOR > Class Template Reference

Ladan-Mozes & Shavit optimistic queue based on Pass-The-Buck (gc::ptb_gc) reclamation schema. More...

#include <lmsqueue_ptb.h>

Detailed Description

template<typename T, class TRAITS, class ALLOCATOR>
class cds::queue::LMSQueue< gc::ptb_gc, T, TRAITS, ALLOCATOR >

Ladan-Mozes & Shavit optimistic queue based on Pass-The-Buck (gc::ptb_gc) reclamation schema.

Ladan-Mozes & Shavit optimistic queue algorithm based on Hazard Pointer (gc::hzp_gc) reclamation schema

Template parameters
  • T type of the data stored in the queue
  • TRAITS class traits. The default is QueueTraits
  • ALLOCATOR node allocator. The default is CDS_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR.
Source
  • [2004] Edya Ladan-Mozes, Nir Shavit "An Optimistic Approach to Lock-Free FIFO Queues"
Common interface: see Queue common interface.
